title: Yudai Nitta
text:
is a Japanese <a href="Track%20cycling">track cyclist</a>. At the <a href="2012%20Summer%20Olympics">2012 Summer Olympics</a>, he competed in the <a href="Cycling%20at%20the%202012%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20team%20sprint">Men's team sprint</a> for the national team. He is also active in Japan as a <a href="keirin">keirin</a> cyclist.
He has qualified to represent Japan at the <a href="2020%20Summer%20Olympics">2020 Summer Olympics</a>.
